text: Helmut Goebel was a male Austrian international table tennis player. He won a gold medal at the 1936 World Table Tennis Championships in the team event. He then secured a silver medal at the 1937 World Table Tennis Championships in the men's doubles with Richard Bergmann. One year later he won another silver at the 1938 World Table Tennis Championships in the men's team event. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Austrian male table tennis players Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Helmut Goebel
